00295 template <typename T>
00296 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, size_type size ) : device_pointer_(0), size_(size) {
00297         malloc();

00301 template <typename T>
00302 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, int init_value, size_type size ) : device_pointer_(0), size_(size) {
00303         malloc();
00304         set(init_value);
00305 }

00308 template <typename T>
00309 memory1d<T>::memory1d( device const& dev, T const* data, size_type size ) : device_pointer_(0), size_(size) {
00310         malloc();
00311         copy_to_device(data);
00312 }

00320                 copy_to_device(first, last);

00327         copy_to_device(other);

00339         copy_to_device(other);

00343 template <typename T>
00344 void memory1d<T>::swap( memory1d& other ) {
00345         std::swap(this.device_pointer_, other.device_pointer_);
00346         std::swap(this.size_, other.size_);
00347 }

00350 template <typename T>
00351 typename memory1d<T>::size_type memory1d<T>::size() const {
00352         return size_;

00355 
00356 template <typename T>
00357 void memory1d<T>::set(int value) {
00358         if (cudaMemset( reinterpret_cast<void*>( device_pointer_ ), value, sizeof(T)*size() ) != cudaSuccess) {
00359                 #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00360                         throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00361                 #endif
00362         }
00363 }
00364 
00365 
00366 template <typename T>
00367 void memory1d<T>::malloc() {
00368         if (cudaMalloc( reinterpret_cast<void**>( &device_pointer_ ), sizeof(T)*size() ) != cudaSuccess) {
00369                 #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00370                         throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00371                 #endif
00372         }
00373 }
00374 
00375 
00376 template <typename T>
00377 void memory1d<T>::free() {
00378         if (cudaFree(device_pointer_) != cudaSuccess) {
00379                 #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00380                         throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00381                 #endif
00382         }
00383 }

00386 #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00387         template <typename T>
00388         template <typename InputIterator>
00389         void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device( InputIterator first, InputIterator last, int offset ) {
00390                 std::vector<T> temp;
00391                 temp.assign(first, last);
00392                 copy_to_device(temp.size(), &temp[0], offset);
00393         }
00394 #endif
00395 
00396 
00397 template <typename T>
00398 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device( T const* data, size_type offset ) {
00399         copy_to_device(size(), data, offset);
00400 }
00401 
00402 
00403 template <typename T>
00404 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device( size_type count, T const* data, size_type offset) {
00405         if (count + offset > size()) {
00406                 #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00407                         throw exception::memory_access_violation();
00408                 #endif
00409         }
00410         
00411         if ( cudaMemcpy(device_pointer_+offset, data, count * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice) != cudaSuccess) {
00412                 #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00413                         throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00414                 #endif
00415         }
00416 }
00417 
00418 template <typename T>
00419 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device (memory1d const& other, size_type offset) {
00420         copy_to_device(other, other.size(), offset);
00421 }
00422 
00423 
00424 template <typename T>
00425 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_device (memory1d const& other, size_type count, size_type offset) {
00426         if (count+offset > size()) {
00427                 #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00428                         throw exception::memory_access_violation();
00429                 #endif
00430         }
00431 
00432         if ( cudaMemcpy(device_pointer_+offset, other.device_pointer_, count * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyDeviceToDevice) != cudaSuccess) {
00433                 #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00434                         throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00435                 #endif
00436         }
00437 }
00438 
00439 
00440 template <typename T>
00441 void memory1d<T>::copy_to_host (T* destination) {
00442         if (cudaMemcpy(destination, device_pointer_, size() * sizeof(T), cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost) != cudaSuccess) {
00443                 #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00444                         throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00445                 #endif
00446         }
00447 }
00448 
00449 #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00450         template <typename T>
00451         template <typename OutputIterator>
00452         void memory1d<T>::copy_to_host(OutputIterator out_iter) {
00453                 std::vector<T> temp( size() );
00454 
00455                 copy_to_host(&temp[0]);
00456 
00457                 std::copy(temp.begin(), temp.end(), out_iter);
00458         }
00459 #endif

00462 #if defined(__CUDACC__)
00463         template <typename T>
00464         T& memory1d<T>::operator[](size_type index) {
00465                 return device_pointer_[index];
00466         }
00467 #endif
00468 
00469 
00470 template <typename T>
00471 T const& memory1d<T>::operator[](size_type index) const {
00472         #if defined(__CUDACC__)
00473                 return device_pointer_[index];
00474         #endif
00475         #if !defined(__CUDACC__)
00476                 T returnee;
00477                 copy_to_device(1, &returnee, index);
00478                 return returnee;
00479         #endif
00480 }
